ComicInfo.Title: The End of the World As We Know It! Siege of Darkness Part 8
ComicInfo.Series: Ghost Rider / Blaze: Spirits of Vengeance
ComicInfo.Summary: The End of the World As We Know It! Siege of Darkness Part 8: The Sanctum Sanctorum is breached and the Midnight Sons are left unprotected. Caretaker takes all of them to the Nightclub for protection. Zarathos is regaining his memory and he realizes that Lilith is not his mother. Blaze, Ghost Rider and Vengeance go back to the cemetery to fight Zarathos. Morbius snares the Medallion of Power. He throws it to Ghost Rider and Caretaker helps Blaze, Ghost Rider and Vengeance to access its power. They defeat Zarathos and send Lilin and the mystical mist back to their own dimension. The Medallion of Power explodes. Zarathos and The Fallen return.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-22 12:10:08. [CVDB66535] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:45:25. [Issue ID 85609]
ComicInfo.Inker: Bud La Rosa,Keith Williams,Bud La Rosa
ComicInfo.Characters: Medallion of Power (destroyed),Johnny Blaze,Pilgrim,Zarathos,Blackout,Nightstalkers [Blade,Ghost Rider [Danny Ketch],Vengeance [Dan Badilino],Morbius,Caretaker,Modred,Hannibal King],Victoria Montesi,The Fallen,Meatmarket,Sam Buchanan,Frank Drake,Lilith,Dr. Strange,Skinner,Nakota
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
